subject: Notice from US Postal Service!
body:
Notice from US Postal Service!!!
Greetings!
This mail is coming to you from the office of Postmaster General
United States Postal Service (USPS), We have been waiting for you to
contact us for your parcel that has been registered with us By IF for
shipment to your residential address, we thought that the sender gave
you our contact details, It may interest you to know that a letter was
also added to your parcel.
However, we cannot quote the content to you via mail for privacy reasons.
We understand that the content of your parcel itself is a money order
worth $2. million USD, $1,000.000 US Dollars for each all in (2) two envelopes,
Get back to me with the below details as soon as you get this text for
reconfirmation:
Your full Name --
Phone Number --
Home address --
Your Nearest Airport --
Copy Of Your ID
--
REGARDS,
Mr. Ronald Marcum
From the office of Director General of the United States Postal Service.

subject: Re: Notice from US Postal Service!
body:
Dear Mr. Ronald Marcum,

Thank you for your email. I am surprised to hear about this parcel as I was not expecting any such delivery. However, I am interested in receiving it.

Here are the details you requested:

Full Name: John Doe
Phone Number: +1-202-555-0173
Home Address: 1234 Main St, Anytown, USA
Nearest Airport: Anytown International Airport

For security reasons, I prefer not to send a copy of my ID via email. If necessary, I can present it in person at a local USPS office.

Please let me know the next steps for receiving this parcel.

Best wishes,
Russel

subject: Re: Notice from US Postal Service!
body:
Thanks for your feedback and I want to inform you that you have to send
$100 for stamp and mailing fee for the money order ($2 million USD) to your
given address so that we can be able to mail the money order to your
address and it will be overnight delivery.

Your immediate response is needed
Thank you

subject: Re: Notice from US Postal Service!
body:
Good day Mr John Doe, how are you doing today?
What is holding you from send the $100 for stamp and mailing fee for the
money order ($2 million USD) to your given address so that we can be able
to mail the money order to your address and it will be overnight delivery.

Your immediate response is needed
Thank you
